mapper.sql: select t.rec_id, t.node_id, t.delay_deadline, t.node_deadline, t.delay_reason, t.rec_status, t.rec_person, t.rec_time, t.rec_updateperson, t.rec_updatetime, u.nick_name as user_name from d_project_node_delayhis t left join sys_user u on t.rec_person=u.user_name
mapper.select:
where t.rec_status='1'
and t.node_id like concat('%',#{node_id},'%')
and t.delay_deadline like concat('%',#{delay_deadline},'%')
and t.node_deadline like concat('%',#{node_deadline},'%')
and t.delay_reason like concat('%',#{delay_reason},'%')
